person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The basket comprises Algeria 's Saharan Blend , Indonesia 's Minas , Nigeria 's Bonny Light , Saudi Arabia 's Arabian Light , Dubai of the UAE , Venezuela 's Tia Juana and Mexico 's Isthmus .

Let's think step by step.

| Person |
|--------|
| Algeria (represented by "Algeria" in the paragraph) |
| Indonesia (represented by "Indonesia" in the paragraph) |
| Nigeria (represented by "Nigeria" in the paragraph) |
| Saudi Arabia (represented by "Saudi Arabia" in the paragraph) |
| UAE (represented by "Dubai of the UAE" in the paragraph) |
| Venezuela (represented by "Venezuela" in the paragraph) |
| Mexico (represented by "Mexico" in the paragraph) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
|--------|
| Algeria |
| Indonesia |
| Nigeria |
| Saudi Arabia |
| UAE (United Arab Emirates) |
| Venezuela |
| Mexico |
